data.name: Tenebrous Dungeon
data.detailed_description:
Tenebrous Dungeon is a single-player FPS with simple, fun, and addictive gameplay reminiscent of shooters from the early 1990's. Set in a medieval fantasy world; you are tasked by the King of Gnarmania to stop the rebel lord and self-proclaimed king of the Tenebrous Highlands, Bartholomew Black, before he starts a war that could engulf the entire kingdom.


  • XBOX 360 & XBOX ONE Controller Support (Includes Rumble)
  • Explore over 20 different areas - spanning various dungeon, castle and outdoor environments.
  • Discover secret places hidden throughout each area in order to find treasure and weapons.
  • Choose from 3 difficulty settings to fit your skill level or play-style.
  • Hearkens back to a bygone-era for video-games when there were NO micro-transactions or "pay-walls". You get the full gameplay experience out-of-the-box.


  • Use ranged, melee and arcane weapons to survive the onslaught of enemies in your way.
  • Destroy barrels and other destructible objects to find stowed away weapons, ammo, and food.
  • Salvage weapons to increase your score and gain experience.
  • Use skill-points you earn when you level up to improve your abilities.
  • Consuming stimulants like leafs, mushrooms, and potions can grant you temporary stat-boosts... but may include some side-effects.


  • Listen to prisoners, examine items and read journals & letters to unravel the dark and mysterious story behind a rebel lord and his unnatural allies.
  • Learn about the long and dark past of Tenebrous Keep.
  • Fight your way through different factions and bosses to stop the rebel lord, and prevent a full-scale war from enveloping the kingdom.

data.short_description: As a war brews over the secession of the Tenebrous Highlands from the Kingdom of Gnarmania, you alone must infiltrate the dungeons of Tenebrous Keep and stop a rebel lord from tearing the kingdom apart.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7 (Service Pack 1)
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU @ 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics or graphics card with 512 MB of dedicated VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10
  • Processor: Quad-core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 1 GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

data.legal_notice: Copyright © 2019 Apathus Software, LLC. All rights reserved.

content_descriptors.notes: Tenebrous Dungeon contains mild violence, crude humor, and light profanity.
